txt.en: 'I was the only one, but I kept written reports in Thelgarth.'
'No matter. There are more important things to attend to for now.'
Instance: An Audience with the Cuan-lûth

'Why can Erlys not see that the odds are stacked against us? Her stubbornness will be the death of her one day.\n\n'Forgive me; that was an ugly thing to say. She wants the best for us, but she can be rather short-sighted during the worst of times.'
'Do others know of our location?'
Observe Igrain's interrogation
'Why have you come?'
'I hunt the Cuan-lûth, not you. Leave now.'
'Duvodiad! If it weren't for Cariad's request, I would not be meeting with you.'
Talk to Cariad
'That's a rather glaring flaw for a spy of Saruman, don't you think?'
Cariad has brought you to meet the rest of his people, the Cuan-lûth of Dunland.
'Yes, but will you not reconsider asking the Rangers -- '
'Then you won't die by my hand today.'
'Do you really wish to be a pawn for someone so uncaring of your survival?'
You should talk to Cariad before approaching Erlys.
'Erlys, there's a woman watching the cave entrance. We don't recognize her.'
Wait and stand your ground
'Then she's a spy. Duvodiad, why don't you try defeating her?'
'A Ranger asked them to investigate \qunsavoury folks\q from the south.'
'I surrender! Please, I don't want to die.'
'Don't worry, [placeholder], you'll get your weapons back.'
'I understand, but I watched [placeholder] defeat several of Saruman's crebain.'

'I'm sorry you had to disarm before entering. My people don't trust you, and if I'm being honest, you'll have to prove yourself to me a bit more before I can fully trust you. I hope you understand.\n\n'Don't worry, no harm will come to you as long as you don't do anything rash. You have my word.'
'Need I remind you that their ancestors stole this land from us?'
'Would he bother telling us apart?'
You should talk to Cariad about Erlys' opinion of the Rangers.
Cariad wishes to discuss matters with Erlys.
'What did he mean by \qunsavoury folks?\q Saruman's spies, or us?'
A spy of Saruman's has been spotted outside the cave.\n\nErlys has ordered you to confront and defeat the spy.
'Ah yes, the one who ignored our warnings and received an arrow for his troubles.'
Defeating Igrain may help the Cuan-lûth trust you more.
Observe the discussion
Igrain has offered to let you leave so that she may freely spy on the Cuan-lûth refugees.\n\nYou should wait and stand your ground.
'Cariad, find and destroy those reports.'
Igrain has surrendered.\n\nYou should observe her interrogation.
Confront the spy outside
'I didn't have much of a choice to begin with.'
'The Rangers won't give up their resources, especially during war.'
'I gave you a chance.'
Talk to Cariad
'I refuse to beg.'
Defeat Igrain
'So now you expect their friends to help us too? That is folly.'
'You, duvodiad. Leave my people be.'
